long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy Multiple Items Effortlessly with Multiple Copy & Clipboard History.
Make multiple copies and save to your clipborad history.
No subscriptions or payments!

Using Multiple Copy & Clipboard History is as simple as 1-2-3:
1. Select your text.
2. Right-click and choose "Save to History and copy to Clipboard".
3. That's it! The text is saved in history and stored in an extension, and it is also immediately copied to the clipboard.

With Multiple Copy & Clipboard History, you can copy multiple items effortlessly and save them in your clipboard history for instant access whenever you need them. Whether you're working on a complex project, drafting multiple emails, or quickly gathering information, Multiple Copy & Clipboard History has you covered.

Multiple Copy & Clipboard History stands out with its straightforward and efficient design. You can easily collect and manage multiple snippets of text without breaking your workflow. The extension ensures that all your copied items are organized and easily accessible, making it perfect for managing extensive research, assembling detailed reports, or handling everyday copy-paste tasks. Embrace the ease of multitasking and enhance your productivity with Multiple Copy & Clipboard History.

User Safety:
- Developer is dedicated to safeguarding your privacy and ensuring the security of your data. Your information stored in our clipboard extension (
Multiple Copy & Clipboard History) remains confidential and secure within your device. We do not store, share, or access your data with any third-party entities.

Limitations:
- Compatibility Issues: The extension may not work seamlessly with all websites and might encounter difficulties when copying data from certain sites or web applications.
- Scope: This extension is designed to function within the Chrome browser window. Copying data from outside the Chrome window, such as from desktop applications or other browsers, is beyond its capabilities and is not supported.
